text: Jolly Rancher is an American brand of sweet hard candy, gummies, jelly beans, lollipops, sour bites, and a line of soda. Originally created in Colorado in the 1950s, the brand has been owned by The Hershey Company since 1996. Category:Candy Category:The Hershey Company Category:1949 establishments in the United States
title: Jolly Rancher
